refnamediv.refpurpose: Return the real group ID of the current process

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the real group id, as an integer.

&reftitle.examples;
posix_getgid example
This example will print out the real group id, even once the effective group id has been changed.
<?php echo 'My real group id is '.posix_getgid(); //20 posix_setegid(40); echo 'My real group id is '.posix_getgid(); //20 echo 'My effective group id is '.posix_getegid(); //40 ?>

&reftitle.seealso;
posix_getgrgid posix_getegid posix_setgid POSIX man page GETGID(2)
